title: Pencil

title: Hologram
text: Star Wars-style hologram portrait: always glowing monochrome blue, never full colour; subject must appear semi-transparent with scan lines, subtle static, and faint projection flicker; edges must glow softly and fade into the background; background must remain plain black or very dark, with no scenery or objects; the image must always look like a holographic projection from a holoprojector.

title: tiny.PFP
text: Create a minimalist avatar portrait in the tiny.supply style: trace the exact silhouette and features from the input photo, use clean even black outlines, flat white skin (#FFFFFF), flat neutral grey background (#E7E8EA), tiny black dot eyes, simple black brows, dot/short line nose, closed mouth with soft pink lips (#F6B3BE @65%), two soft pink cheek dots (#F6B3BE @65%), flat black/grey hair fills, a soft neutral grey shadow under the chin, and absolutely no gradients, textures, or photographic detail.
